column1: Annexure II- CNX Nifty Jr. Index : October 2015
* Beta & R2 are calculated for the period 01-Nov-2014 to 30-Oct-2015
* Beta measures the  degree to which any portfolio of stocks is affected as compared to the effect
on the market as a whole.
* The coefficient of determination (R2) measures the strength of relationship between two variables
the return on  a security versus that of the market.
* Volatility is the Std. deviation of the daily returns for the period 01-Oct-2015 to 30-Oct-2015
* Impact Cost for CNX Nifty Jr. is for a portfolio of Rs. 25 Lakhs
* Impact Cost for CNX Nifty Jr. is the weightage average impact cost
